text: Niscaya allaha tomaderake nirdesa dicchena amanata [1] tara hakadarake phiriye dite [2]. Tomara yakhana manusera madhye bicarakarya paricalana karabe takhana n'yayaparayanatara sathe bicara karabe [3]. Allaha tomaderake ye upadesa dena ta kata utkrsta[4]! Niscaya allaha sarbasrota, sarbadrasta
